summary: A comprehensive suite of transformer‑based components for automatic speech recognition, offering configurable encoders (standard, bridge, perceiver, pooling, bottleneck), decoders, multi‑head attention, positional encoding, feed‑forward layers, and generation utilities to build, train, and run ASR models.
business_intent: Enable developers to rapidly assemble, train, and deploy high‑accuracy transformer speech‑to‑text systems within the NVIDIA NeMo framework by providing modular, reusable neural network building blocks.
